titleInfo.title: John B. Heroman, Sr. photograph collection, circa 1885-1940

mods.abstract: The digital collection consists of four photograph albums and unassociated loose album pages, loose photographs, and similar materials taken from the larger physical collection. All materials relate to the Heroman family, Baton Rouge and New Orleans, La., and the countryside around Baton Rouge.
